VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_MUST_CONDITION_TRUE_T.desc: Configure valid vlan sub interface must condition true.

VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_MUST_CONDITION_FALSE_.desc: Configure vlan sub interface must condition false.

VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_IP_PREFIX_PORT_NON_EX.desc: Configure ip prefix vlan sub interface with non-existing reference.

VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_INVALID_VLAN_ID_TEST.desc: Configure vlan sub interface with invalid vlan id.

VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_INVALID_VLAN_ID_WITH_.desc: Configure vlan sub interface with invalid vlan id with leading zeros.

VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_IP_PREFIX_EMPTY_STRIN.desc: Configure ip prefix vlan sub interface with empty ip prefx.

VLAN_SUB_INTERFACE_INVALID_NAME_TEST.desc: Configure invalid vlan sub interface name with no separator.
